text: Tara pichata yetiya te'om suryaka diptimanaraupe udaya horaa dekhile tetiya ka’le, ‘e'ito mora raba, e'ito ata'itakai danara’. Yetiya e'ito'o asta ga’la tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘he mora sampradaya! Tomaloke yaka allahara lagata ansi karaa tara lagata mora kono samparka na'i (tara paraa ma'i mukta)’
